summary: I HAVE A CHEVROLET VENTURE 1999 THAT HAS HAD AN INTAKE GASKET LEAK.  I HAVE RESEARCHED THIS PROBLEM ON THE INTERNET AND THERE HAVE BEEN MANY SIMILAR PROBLEMS.  MANY SERVICE TECHNICIANS HAVE ALSO STATED THAT GM HAS HAD A PROBLEM WITH INTAKE GASKETS.  GM SHOULD RECALL ALL VEHICLES AFFECTED AND PAY REPAIR BILLS ON ALL OTHERS ALREADY FIXED.  *NLM
